ch.bfh.ti.gravis.core.graph.item.vertex

Class RestrictedVertex

  • java.lang.Object
    • ch.bfh.ti.gravis.core.graph.item.AbstractRestrictedGraphItem
      • ch.bfh.ti.gravis.core.graph.item.vertex.RestrictedVertex
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IRestrictedGraphItem, IRestrictedVertex

    final class RestrictedVertex
extends AbstractRestrictedGraphItem
implements IRestrictedVertex
    This implementation of the IRestrictedVertex interface decorates a vertex of type IVertex.
    Author:
    Patrick Kofmel (kofmp1@bfh.ch)
